text: Hi <@U026PT0D7> <@U02AUNA0P> <@U0265G76F> <@U026PHQ3J>  - based on the issue with lego movies and the YouTube API, it sounds like the client is interested in removing the Lego Picks button on the gallery page.  Can you please give this some thought, and let me know if you have any questions or concerns, or see any issues with that plan?
i’m fine with it honestly. the movies from the Lego Picks section weren’t made with the movie maker app anyways, so it was kind of like false advertisement whenever you watched one.
from a development standpoint it should be super easy to remove
is this a green-light for me?
I just sent a quick note to the client to confirm
I think she's on board, but want to make sure
I'll let you know as soon as I hear back from her, and we can get Flemming another build.
Late to this but agreed with recommend
<@U026PT0D7>: Approved! Please remove this button and then create a new build.
Go ahead and put it on crashlytics, so we can do a few quick tests, and then they've asked for us to deliver via a shared acronis folder
